titleStmt.title: A dispute against the English-popish ceremonies, obtruded vpon the Church of Scotland Wherein not only our ovvne argumemts [sic] against the same are strongly confirmed, but likewise the ansvveres and defences of our opposites, such as Hooker, Mortoune ... Forbesse, &c. particularly confuted.
titleStmt.author: Gillespie, George, 1613-1648.

titleStmt.title: A dispute against the English-popish ceremonies, obtruded vpon the Church of Scotland Wherein not only our ovvne argumemts [sic] against the same are strongly confirmed, but likewise the ansvveres and defences of our opposites, such as Hooker, Mortoune ... Forbesse, &c. particularly confuted.
titleStmt.author: Gillespie, George, 1613-1648.

publicationStmt.date: in the yeare of our Lord 1637.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
